mapper.insert: insert into recordinfo(chatRecord, resultRecord, resultCode,fileName, recordMd5, recordTime, appId) values ( #{chatRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{appId} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from recordinfo where recordMd5= #{md5 } and appId = #{appId}
